articles.title: Abby Erceg unavailable for Football Ferns' return to action following club coach's firing - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Senior defender unavailable for matches against Canada as she 'needed to be' at her American club following recent upheaval.
articles.content:
The Football Ferns' defensive stocks are set to be tested when they face the reigning Olympic champions in a pair of friendlies later this month with a squad featuring six uncapped players.

articles.title: Popular theory of Native American origins debunked by genetics and skeletal biology: Latest scientific findings suggest the ancestral Native American population does not originate in Japan, as believed by many archeologists - Science Daily
articles.description: A widely accepted theory of Native American origins coming from Japan has been attacked in a new scientific study, which shows that the genetics and skeletal biology 'simply does not match-up.'

articles.title: This drone robot created by an American lab could be Iron Man's distant cousin - The Star Online
articles.description: Researchers at the California Institute of Technology (Caltech) have developed an amazing bipedal robot that can walk as well as fly.
